Module io.github.jonloucks.concurrency.api
Package io.github.jonloucks.concurrency.api

Interface StateMachine<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the user define state type
All Superinterfaces:
Supplier<T>, WaitableSupplier<T>
public interface StateMachine<T> extends WaitableSupplier<T>
State machine. User defined states with rules to restrict state transitions.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Interface
    Description
    static interface 
    StateMachine.Config<T>
    StateMachine configuration
    static interface 
    StateMachine.Rule<T>
    Opt-in interface a state type can implement to assist in determining the valid transitions
    static interface 
    StateMachine.Transition<S,R>
    Defines how a transition between states will be done

  • Method Details

    • setState

      boolean setState(String event, T state)
      Set the current state, state must already exist and be an allowed transition
      Parameters:
      event - the event name
      state - the new state
      Returns:
      true if state was changed
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when event is null, state is null, or unknown

    • getState

      default T getState()
      Get the current state
      Returns:
      the current state, never null

    • hasState

      boolean hasState(T state)
      Determine if the given state is known
      Parameters:
      state - the state to check
      Returns:
      true iif the state is known
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when state is null

    • isTransitionAllowed

      boolean isTransitionAllowed(String event, T state)
      Determine if a transition is allowed from the current state to a new one.
      Parameters:
      event - the event that is triggering the transition
      state - the candidate state to transition to
      Returns:
      if transition event is allowed to change the current state to the given state
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when event is null, state is null, or unknown

    • transition

      <B extends StateMachine.Transition.Builder<B, T, R>, R> R transition(Consumer<StateMachine.Transition.Builder<B,T,R>> builderConsumer)
      Execute a transition from the current state to another
      Type Parameters:
      B - the transition return value
      R - the return type of the transition. For example, a Closeable during open.
      Parameters:
      builderConsumer - the transition builder consumer
      Returns:
      the builder consumer.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when builderConsumer is null or required fields are not present.

    • transition

      <R> R transition(StateMachine.Transition<T,R> transition)
      Execute a transition from the current state to another
      Type Parameters:
      R - the return type of the transition. For example, a Closeable during open.
      Parameters:
      transition - the transition to execute
      Returns:
      the transition return value
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when transition is null or required fields are not present.
